descriptionlist.description:
Various enhancements for Safari
Features: - Forced HTTPS with custom site exceptions - There are "Open in new tab" and "Open in background" options - New option to open long clicked link in opposite surfing mode - Download any file from your phone via file - picker. - Advanced Downloads: Upload files to a local directory and more! - Switch desktop mode - Long press on sentences to paste them into the URL bar. - Switch to preferred surfing mode when starting / resuming / opening external link - Close all tabs from preferred surfing mode (s) when exiting / minimizing Safari - Clear browser data on exit / minimize Safari - Configurable gestures in URL bar - Full screen scrolling - Lock top and bottom border (when scrolling) - Disable private surfing - Change (almost) any Safari interface color - Always open click links in a new tab - Suppress dialog that appears when accessing mailto url via WebClip on iOS 10.
